lead_paragraph: The Boston Red Sox have acquired left-handed reliever Fernando Abad from the Minnesota Twins for minor-league pitcher Pat Light.

headline.print_headline: Red Sox Acquire Reliever Fernando Abad From Minnesota Twins
headline.main: Red Sox Acquire Reliever Fernando Abad From Minnesota Twins
